name: paperdebugger (PaperDebugger)
description: [é¡¹ç›®çº§] A Plugin-Based Multi-Agent System for In-Editor Academic Writing, Review, and Editingã€‚æ¥æº: https://github.com/PaperDebugger/paperdebugger

genes.title: é¡¹ç›®æ¦‚è¿°
genes.content:
The PaperDebugger backend is built with modern technologies:
- **Language**: Go 1.24+ - **Framework**: Gin (HTTP) + gRPC (API) - **Database**: MongoDB - **AI Integration**: OpenAI API - **Architecture**: Microservices with Protocol Buffers - **Authentication**: JWT-based with OAuth support

genes.title: æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§
genes.content:
PaperDebugger never modifies your project, it only reads and provides suggestions.

- **ğŸ¤– AI-Powered Chat**: Intelligent conversations about your Overleaf project
- **âš¡ Instant Insert**: One-click insertion of AI responses into your project
- **ğŸ’¬ Comment System**: Automatically generate and insert comments into your project
- **ğŸ“š Prompt Library**: Custom prompt templates for different use cases
- **ğŸ”’ Privacy First**: Your content stays secure - we only read, never modify
- **ğŸ§  Multi-Agent Orchestration** â€“ [XtraMCP](demo/xtramcp/readme.md) support for literature-grounded research, AI-Conf
